sourcesContent:
<template>
  <form>
    <input type="text" name="title" placeholder="Add Todo..." />
    <input type="submit" value="Submit" class="btn" />
  </form>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: "AddTodo",
};
</script>

<style scoped>
form {
  display: flex;
}
input[type="text"] {
  flex: 10;
  padding: 5px;
}
input[type="submit"] {
  flex: 2;
}
</style>
